author: Simon Difford
description: This flavoursome mix of coffee and chocolate is further enhanced if vanilla-infused rum is used.
name: Black Diamond
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
30 ml Dark cr√®me de cacao liqueur
